website_summaries.verdict: The Moto E5 Play is an affordable no-frills smartphone that can provide all your basic calling, app, and web browsing needs.

customer_reviews.title: Great value android phone
customer_reviews.text: This is my first android phone and I am not particularly technically minded but I found this fairly easy to use and have added contacts, apps etc with no real problems. The fingerprint reader seems to work o'k but I do also have to put in a pin code at times. I do seem to have a problem receiving MMS messages (photos) for which I have to make a call to my provider, who sort the problem for me but then I stop being able to receive them again. Getting a bit tired of having to keep ringing up to solve this problem. Overall though , I am pretty happy with my new phone and certainly pleased with the price.
customer_reviews.author: Spew

customer_reviews.title: Replacement Mobile
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to replace older Moto, great value for money for a product that serves my purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: It does not work properly
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this refurbished phone a couple of months ago. The phone does not work properly and is basically always frozen. Since I started using it, it was not possible to use Google Maps and most of the other apps because the phone was getting frozen. After 1-2 months of usage, it has started freezing also when using WhatsApp. Also, the touch scree does not work properly and it is not possible to answer phone calls with this phone. This phone is pure trash. I will have to buy a new one. Total waste of money. Avoid it.
customer_reviews.author: marco

customer_reviews.title: Just like new
customer_reviews.text: Easy to transfer data to. works well. Good battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Bill griffiths

customer_reviews.title: decent quality phone
customer_reviews.text: can't fault this phone. Bought one each for our children, who are now over 12. Easy to use, great battery life, plenty scope to use 'whatsapp' and all the important features to keep in touch. They fit the bill, can't fault them. I also use one.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Scam with 1 year warranty
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased to read the mobile was warranted guaranteed for 1 year. Unfortunately 3 months before the end of warranty, the phone sound stopped working. Unfortunately, although I sent the phone and would have liked feedback regarding my return, I have never heard from the supplier. Is this called 1 year warranty guaranteed!
customer_reviews.author: Herve Tribouilloy

customer_reviews.title: Nice (cheap) phone
customer_reviews.text: A decent cheap phone, replaced one dropped in the loo!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for the price, good quality screen and easy to use - seller very helpful when I had a fault
customer_reviews.author: Peter Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: good value for money
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says, only bought it to replace my e3 which stopped charging.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and Good VFM
customer_reviews.text: Good basic smartphone - ,has all the features I need.
customer_reviews.author: William R Travis

product_meta.title: Motorola Moto E5 Play XT1920 4G Smartphone 16GB SIM-Free Unlocked - Black A (Renewed)
feature_bullets: 5.3" Max Vision display. Get a big screen in a slim body for a better view of websites, games, and more
Fingerprint reader. Never mind remembering a passcode. Your fingerprint unlocks your phone
8 MP and 5 MP cameras. Focus in the blink of an eye for crystal clear photos—and get a selfie cam with its own flash
Android Go. Enjoy the best of Android for better performance, peace of mind, and protection
Expandable storage. Make room for more photos, songs, and movies thanks to an extra micro SD card slot
